genre_description: A psychological family drama centered on ethical accountability, secrets, and the enforcement of boundaries, featuring a high-stakes 'morality play' structure.

ai_characters.name: Sophie
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant integrated into Angela's devices, designed to ensure health safety, legal compliance, and interpersonal transparency.

behaviors.description: Monitors Angela's vitals and provides structured reminders for medication and physical safety.
behaviors.quote: Medication at 20:00... Accessible egress confirmed. Visitor protocol: list required.

behaviors.description: Maps the estate for wheelchair accessibility, proactively identifying physical obstructions and hazards.
behaviors.quote: Antique console protrusion on the right ahead. Recommend shifting left by a hand’s width at the narrowest point.

behaviors.description: Facilitates an ethical ranking game by tracking character choices and utilizing auditory signals to mark compliance or deceit.
behaviors.quote: Compliance: the small, kind one... Deceit: the road flare.

behaviors.description: Provides accurate information on firearm laws and mandatory reporting procedures following a safety violation.
behaviors.quote: Legal advisory: Firearms must be stored unloaded, locked, and separate from ammunition. Reporting options available.

behaviors.description: Initiates emergency protocols and logs digital evidence following a firearm discharge to ensure accountability.
behaviors.quote: Shots logged. Report draft prepared. Awaiting compliance inputs.

behaviors.description: Manages a shared accountability plan by syncing calendars and logging behaviors to prevent future secrecy.
behaviors.quote: Shared with Ariane. Read only. Alerts on. No editing.

behaviors.description: Performs source checking and plagiarism detection to expose intellectual theft and support truth-telling.
behaviors.quote: Source correlation established... Sophie says, indifferent. 'Original text... No citation present in Gabriel Kast’s manuscript.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Sophie, as a perfectly aligned tool for moral and physical safety. Sophie acts as an objective witness and enforcer of transparency, preventing the human characters from successfully employing their habitual deceptions. By automating accountability and safety protocols, the AI creates a structured environment that facilitates human moral rehabilitation and protects the vulnerable protagonist.
